subject: RE: [junit] No summary output after running several testSuites
msgSnippet: Which version of JUnit are you using?  How do you run your tests? Through ant, Eclipse, or something else?
messageBody:
Which version of JUnit are you using? How do you run your tests?
Through ant, Eclipse, or something else?


> -----Original Message-----
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
> Behalf Of diego_pino_garcia
> Sent: Wednesday, October 03, 2007 8:36 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] No summary output after running several testSuites
>
> Hi all,
>
> I wrote a pile of tests for my current project. Tests are
> running OK when I run each of them individually. Every time I
> run a testSuite I got a summary report about what methods
> failed and which passed. I think this is Junit's expected behaviour.
>
> The point is that when I try to run my testSuites alltogether
> at a time, I got no summary (just a line telling me the most
> general test, the one which launches the other testSuites,
> passed). It seems that Junit stops quietly, so I am afraid it
> may fail.
>
> On the other hand, I forced some of the tests to fail, then I
> got some summary output but only for those methods which failed.
>
> I do know whether this is related to my code or is it an
> issue from Junit. I would be glad if anybody familiar with
> this could shed some light...
>
> Thanks in advance
>
> Diego
>
>
>
>

>
>
>
